vocabulary.example: I run every morning for exercise.

vocabulary.translation: To push oneself off the ground
vocabulary.example: The children jump on the bed.

vocabulary.translation: To move at a regular pace by lifting feet
To be in a position with weight on buttocks
To be in an upright position on feet
vocabulary.example: Stand up when your name is called.

vocabulary.translation: To rest with eyes closed and mind inactive
vocabulary.example: I sleep eight hours every night.

vocabulary.translation: To put food in the mouth and swallow
To take liquid into the mouth and swallow
To engage in activity for enjoyment
vocabulary.example: The kids play in the garden.
